title:
On the Twisted Spectral Large Sieve Inequality for $\mathrm{PGL}_2
  (\mathbb{Z}[i]) \backslash \mathrm{PGL}_2 (\mathbb{C})$
abstract:
In this paper, we extend the twisted spectral large sieve inequalities of
Deshouillers, Iwaniec, Luo, and Young from $\mathrm{SL}_2 (\mathbb{Z})$ onto
$\mathrm{PGL}_2 (\mathbb{Z}[i])$.
